author: AP
title: Heat G Goran Dragic plans to stay stateside during NBA layoff
description: Miami Heat guard Goran Dragic says prepared to stay in the United States this offseason if that's what the NBA schedule necessitates.
content:
MIAMI (AP) Goran Dragic of the Miami Heat said Tuesday that he is prepared to forgo his annual offseason move back to his native Slovenia if that is what the NBA schedule necessitates.
Dragic, his wife and their two children are in Miami and have no plans to… [+2163 chars]
